mapper.select: select b.*, case when b.user_custom = 0 then bc.id else c.id end as cid, case when b.user_custom = 0 then bc.name else c.name end as name, case when b.user_custom = 0 then bc.incomed else c.incomed end as incomed from bill as b left join bill_category as bc on b.category_id = bc.id left join custom_bill_category as c on b.category_id = c.id where b.user_id = #{userId}
